article:
The '1981–82 Football League Cup' was the twenty-second season of the
Football League Cup, a knockout competition for England's top 92 football
clubs. The competition started on 31 August 1981 and ended with the final 13
March 1982.

The final was contested by First Division teams Tottenham Hotspur and Liverpool
at Wembley Stadium in London.
